<<<<<<< HEAD
A continuation of the Friendly debate by the same author. Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707. Wild, Robert, 1609-1679. Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707. Friendly debate between a conformist and a non-conformist.
[16], 248 p.
Printed for R. Royston ..., London : 1669.
Errata: prelim. p. [16]. Includes bibliographical references. Attributed to Simon Patrick; also to Robert Wild. Cf. NUC pre-1956. Identified on film and reel guide as P779. Reproduction of original in:Henry E. Huntington Library.
=======
